article_title: Smithereens fan helping idol pay tab for surgery
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Sometime in the mid-1980s, Victor Erlanger attended a show by the New Jersey power-pop band the Smithereens in the Newport Music Hall. Although the date of the Columbus concert escapes him, the memories haven’t. Some 30 years later, when news surfaced in the summer that Smithereens frontman Pat DiNizio was facing tough times, Erlanger took his fandom to another level.
